author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a pan, add the garlic and sauté for 1 minute.  Stir in the peppers and the cherry tomatoes and heat for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the salami, beans and courgette and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the parsley and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  2 roasted pepper strips from a jar, chopped,  8 cherry tomatoes, cut in half,  6 baby salami sausages, cut in half lengthways,  85g/3oz tinned cannellini beans, rinsed and drained,  ½ courgette, diced,  2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
